name: VoiceTools
short: Various tools to make voice channels better!
description:
Various tools to make voice channels better!
Available modules:
- VIP - Set users and roles not counting to user limit on voice channel
- ForceLimit - Force user limit to all members of the server including admins (kick user when exceeding limit)
end_user_data_statement:
This cog does not persistently store end user data. This cog does store discord IDs as needed for operation.
Discord IDs of users may occasionally be logged to file as part of debug logging.
install_msg: Thanks for installing VoiceTools. Use `[p]voicetools` to configure the cog.
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
